ticker: Join us for live DJs mixing every weekend!
Join our VRChat group or visit us on Bluesky for news on our next events.

event.top: Come in from the cold to
ticker: Night one of two, is ready for you!
Please can all passengers be mindful of on-going station improvements and resist the urge to use construction cones as a hat. Thank you.

performers.name: The White Crayon
ticker: 'You gotta live life like a sandwich. No matter which way you flip it, the bread always come first.'

performers.name: Liquid Bass
ticker: 'Time to dig deep into the underground'

performers.name: Japhet
ticker: Final DJ of the night now boarding...
'Remember to be the change you want to see'

performers.name: **TERMINATES HERE**
ticker: Come back tomorrow for more live music!
This Bass Station is comprised of two coaches... I mean, evenings! That's right, two of them! We're now running Fridays and Saturdays!
Check out our posters at spawn or at the back wall of the station concourse for our full timetable this weekend!
